remarks: For ` r ` large enough, the final expression is less then the given positive ` E ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem47.ibl $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. I |-> F ) e. L^1 ) $.
fourierdlem47.iblmul $e |- ( ( ph /\ r e. RR ) -> ( x e. I |-> ( F x. -u G ) ) e. L^1 ) $.
fourierdlem47.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> F e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem47.g $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) /\ r e. CC ) -> G e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem47.absg $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) /\ r e. RR ) -> ( abs ` G ) <_ 1 ) $.
fourierdlem47.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem47.x $e |- X = ( abs ` A ) $.
fourierdlem47.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem47.y $e |- Y = ( abs ` C ) $.
fourierdlem47.z $e |- Z = S. I ( abs ` F ) _d x $.
fourierdlem47.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. RR+ ) $.
fourierdlem47.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ r e. CC ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem47.absb $e |- ( ( ph /\ r e. RR ) -> ( abs ` B ) <_ 1 ) $.
fourierdlem47.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ r e. CC ) -> D e. CC ) $.
fourierdlem47.absd $e |- ( ( ph /\ r e. RR ) -> ( abs ` D ) <_ 1 ) $.
fourierdlem47.m $e |- M = ( ( |_ ` ( ( ( ( X + Y ) + Z ) / E ) + 1 ) ) + 1 ) $.
fourierdlem47 $p |- ( ph -> E. m e. NN A. r e. ( m (,) +oo ) ( abs ` ( ( ( A x. -u ( B / r ) ) - ( C x. -u ( D / r ) ) ) - S. I ( F x. -u ( G / r ) ) _d x ) ) < E ) $.
$d A m $.
$d B m $.
$d C m $.
$d D m $.
$d E m $.
$d F m $.
$d G m $.
$d I m x $.
$d M m r x $.
$d ph r x $.
